paragraphs.title: Nueva versión - nov 21
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

drop table sandbox_datascientist.jfp_terminales_flujo_01;
create table sandbox_datascientist.jfp_terminales_flujo_01 stored as orc as
select 
a.*,
case 
-- when a.fl_terminal='Sin Usim' and a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' then 'CASIM'
when substring(c1.imsi,8,1) <> '9' and d1.banda_general_tx='LTE Compatible' and a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' then 'CASIM'
when a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' and a.fl_total_so='actualizable' and a.fl_apple=0 then 'Actualizacion_Android'
when a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' and a.fl_total_so='actualizable' and a.fl_apple=1 then 'Actualizacion_Apple'
when a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' and a.fl_total_so='Obsoleto' and a.fl_apple=1 then 'CATER_APPLE'
when a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' and (a.fl_total_so='Obsoleto' and a.fl_apple=0) then 'CATER_ANDROID'
when a.ani=c.ani then 'Mal configurado'
end as FL_CAMPANIA
from sandbox.jg_tablero_terminales a
--------------------Modificacion 6/4/22-----------------------------------------------

-- inner join SBX_PLAN_BIENVENIDA.ABT_Suscripcion_Movil b on a.ani=b.valor_recurso_primario_cd and b.periodo_nr=a.mes
inner join ACCESS_DATA.AT_Parque_M b on a.ani=b.valor_recurso_primario_cd and b.periodo_nr=a.mes 
left join sandbox_datascientist.jfp_imsis_trafico_01 c1 on a.ani=substring(c1.ani,3,10)
left join access_data.at_tacs_gsma_m d1 on a.tac_nr=d1.tac_nr and d1.periodo_nr=date_format(add_months(current_date,-1),'yyyyMM') ---------------------------------------Cambiar periodo fecha 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- left join (select mes, ani, count(*) from sandbox.jg_terminales_mal_config where mes >= 202109 group by mes, ani) c on a.ani = c.ani and a.mes =c.mes
left join (select mes, ani, count(*) from sandbox.jg_terminales_mal_config where mes >= cast(date_format(add_months(current_date,-6),'yyyyMM') as int) group by mes, ani) c on a.ani = c.ani and a.mes =c.mes                                                                                                                                     ------------MODIF JB 13/10/22
-- where a.mes>=202109
where a.mes>=cast(date_format(add_months(current_date,-6),'yyyyMM') as int)                                                                         ------------MODIF JB 13/10/22
and b.Suscripcion_CD NOT LIKE 'K%'
and b.Linea_Negocio_CD = 'WRLS'
;

drop table sandbox_datascientist.jfp_terminales_flujo_02;
create table sandbox_datascientist.jfp_terminales_flujo_02 stored as orc as
select 
a.*,
nvl(b.FL_CAMPANIA, c.FL_CAMPANIA) as fl_campania_n_1
from sandbox_datascientist.jfp_terminales_flujo_01 a 
left join sandbox_datascientist.jfp_terminales_flujo_01 b on a.ani=b.ani and a.mes=b.mes+1
left join sandbox_datascientist.jfp_terminales_flujo_01 c on a.ani=c.ani and a.mes=c.mes+89
-- where a.mes>=202109
where a.mes>=cast(date_format(add_months(current_date,-6),'yyyyMM') as int)
;


drop table sandbox_datascientist.jfp_terminales_flujo_03;
create table sandbox_datascientist.jfp_terminales_flujo_03 stored as orc as
select 
a.*,
case 
when fl_campania_n_1 is null and FL_CAMPANIA is not null then 'ingresa'
when fl_campania_n_1 is not null and FL_CAMPANIA is not null then 'mantiene'
when fl_campania_n_1 is not null and FL_CAMPANIA is null then 'sale'
end as fl_flujo
from sandbox_datascientist.jfp_terminales_flujo_02 a
;

drop table sandbox_datascientist.jfp_terminales_flujo_04;
create table sandbox_datascientist.jfp_terminales_flujo_04 stored as orc as
select 
a.*,
case  when fl_flujo= 'sale' then fl_campania_n_1 
    when fl_flujo in ('ingresa','mantiene') then fl_campania
    else 0 end as fl_camp_compl
from sandbox_datascientist.jfp_terminales_flujo_03 a
;

paragraphs.title: Salida
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

select 
a.mes	,
case 
when a.tipo_cliente_de like '%Individuo%' then 'Individuo' 
when a.tipo_cliente_de not like '%Individuo%' then Tipo_Organizacion_DE
else 'N/A'
end as sub_segmento,
case when a.producto like '%Prepago%' then 1 else 0 end as fl_prepago	,
a.fl_campania	,
a.fl_flujo	,
a.fl_camp_compl	,
case when a.fl_region = 'AMBA' then 'AMBA'
when a.fl_region like 'INT%' then 'INT'
else 'No informado' end as Region,
b.m2m_fl,
case when b.score_crediticio_nr between 0 and 99 then 1 else 0 end fl_score_cred,
count(1) as q
from  sandbox_datascientist.jfp_terminales_flujo_04 a

--------------------Modificacion 6/4/22-----------------------------------------------

-- inner join SBX_PLAN_BIENVENIDA.ABT_Suscripcion_Movil b on a.ani=b.valor_recurso_primario_cd and b.periodo_nr=a.mes
left join ACCESS_DATA.AT_Parque_M b on a.ani=b.valor_recurso_primario_cd and b.periodo_nr=a.mes 
where b.Suscripcion_CD NOT LIKE 'K%'
and b.Linea_Negocio_CD = 'WRLS'
and a.mes=date_format(add_months(current_date,-1),'yyyyMM')
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
group by 
a.mes	,
case 
when a.tipo_cliente_de like '%Individuo%' then 'Individuo' 
when a.tipo_cliente_de not like '%Individuo%' then Tipo_Organizacion_DE
else 'N/A'
end,
case when a.producto like '%Prepago%' then 1 else 0 end 	,
case when a.fl_region = 'AMBA' then 'AMBA'
when a.fl_region like 'INT%' then 'INT'
else 'No informado' end,
a.fl_campania	,
a.fl_flujo	,
a.fl_camp_compl ,
a.fl_region,
m2m_fl,
case when b.score_crediticio_nr between 75 and 99 then 1 else 0 end
;

paragraphs.title: Salida Mal Configurados (DESUSO)
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

select 
a.mes	,
case 
when a.tipo_cliente_de like '%Individuo%' then 'Individuo' 
when a.tipo_cliente_de not like '%Individuo%' then Tipo_Organizacion_DE
else 'N/A'
end as sub_segmento,
case when a.producto like '%Prepago%' then 1 else 0 end as fl_prepago	,
a.fl_campania	,
a.fl_flujo	,
count(1) as q
from  sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_malconfig_flujo_03 a
left join  SBX_PLAN_BIENVENIDA.ABT_Suscripcion_Movil b  on a.ani=b.valor_recurso_primario_cd and a.mes=b.periodo_nr
group by 
a.mes	,
case 
when a.tipo_cliente_de like '%Individuo%' then 'Individuo' 
when a.tipo_cliente_de not like '%Individuo%' then Tipo_Organizacion_DE
else 'N/A'
end,
case when a.producto like '%Prepago%' then 1 else 0 end 	,
a.fl_campania	,
a.fl_flujo
;

paragraphs.title: Agregado Oct-21 - Flujo Mal Configurados (DESUSO)
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)
drop table sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_malconfig_flujo_01;
create table sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_malconfig_flujo_01 stored as orc as
select 
a.*,
case when b.ani is not null then 1 else 0 end as FL_CAMPANIA
from sandbox.jg_tablero_terminales a 
left join sandbox.jg_terminales_mal_config b
on a.ani = b.ani and a.mes = b.mes
where a.mes>=202107
;

drop table sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_malconfig_flujo_02;
create table sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_malconfig_flujo_02 stored as orc as
select 
a.*,
nvl(b.FL_CAMPANIA, c.FL_CAMPANIA) as fl_campania_n_1
from sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_malconfig_flujo_01 a 
left join sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_malconfig_flujo_01 b on a.ani=b.ani and a.mes=b.mes+1
left join sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_malconfig_flujo_01 c on a.ani=c.ani and a.mes=c.mes+89
--where a.mes>=202104
;

drop table sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_malconfig_flujo_03;
create table sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_malconfig_flujo_03 stored as orc as
select 
a.*,
case 
when (fl_campania_n_1 is null or fl_campania_n_1 = 0) and FL_CAMPANIA = 1 then 'ingresa'
when fl_campania_n_1 = 1 and FL_CAMPANIA = 1 then 'mantiene'
when fl_campania_n_1 = 1 and FL_CAMPANIA = 0 then 'sale'
end as fl_flujo
from sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_malconfig_flujo_02 a
;

paragraphs.title: Entradas, salidas y mant de camp SO, cater y casim (desuso)
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

-----------Version vieja (cambio en nov21)-------------
/*drop table sandbox.jg_terminales_flujo_01;
create table sandbox.jg_terminales_flujo_01 stored as orc as
select 
a.*,
case 
when a.fl_terminal='Sin Usim' and a.tipo_cliente_de in('Individuo','Empresa') and a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' then 'CASIM'
when a.tipo_cliente_de in('Individuo','Empresa') and a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' and a.fl_total_so='actualizable' and fl_apple=0 then 'Actualizacion_Android'
when a.tipo_cliente_de in('Individuo','Empresa') and a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' and a.fl_total_so='actualizable' and fl_apple=1 then 'Actualizacion_Apple'
when a.tipo_cliente_de in('Individuo','Empresa') and a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' and a.fl_total_so='Obsoleto' and fl_apple=1 then 'CATER_APPLE'
when a.tipo_cliente_de in('Individuo','Empresa') and a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' and (a.fl_total_so='Obsoleto' and fl_apple=0) then 'CATER_ANDROID'
end as FL_CAMPANIA
from sandbox.jg_tablero_terminales a
where a.mes>=202106
;*/
--------------------------------------------------------

drop table sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_flujo_01;
create table sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_flujo_01 stored as orc as
select 
a.*,
case 
when a.fl_terminal='Sin Usim' and a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' then 'CASIM'
when a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' and a.fl_total_so='actualizable' and fl_apple=0 then 'Actualizacion_Android'
when a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' and a.fl_total_so='actualizable' and fl_apple=1 then 'Actualizacion_Apple'
when a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' and a.fl_total_so='Obsoleto' and fl_apple=1 then 'CATER_APPLE'
when a.unidad_negocio='Movil' and a.fl_navegador='NAVEGADOR' and (a.fl_total_so='Obsoleto' and fl_apple=0) then 'CATER_ANDROID'
end as FL_CAMPANIA
from sandbox.jg_tablero_terminales a
where a.mes>=202106
;

drop table sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_flujo_02;
create table sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_flujo_02 stored as orc as
select 
a.*,
nvl(b.FL_CAMPANIA, c.FL_CAMPANIA) as fl_campania_n_1
from sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_flujo_01 a 
left join sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_flujo_01 b on a.ani=b.ani and a.mes=b.mes+1
left join sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_flujo_01 c on a.ani=c.ani and a.mes=c.mes+89
where a.mes>=202106
;


drop table sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_flujo_03;
create table sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_flujo_03 stored as orc as
select 
a.*,
case 
when fl_campania_n_1 is null and FL_CAMPANIA is not null then 'ingresa'
when fl_campania_n_1 is not null and FL_CAMPANIA is not null then 'mantiene'
when fl_campania_n_1 is not null and FL_CAMPANIA is null then 'sale'
end as fl_flujo
from sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_flujo_02 a
;

drop table sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_flujo_04;
create table sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_flujo_04 stored as orc as
select 
a.*,
case  when fl_flujo= 'sale' then fl_campania_n_1 else 0 end as fl_flujo_salida
from sandbox_datascientist.aoc_jbr_terminales_flujo_03 a
;
